text: Mac is a 1992 drama movie. The movie is about three brothers who go into construction when their father dies. John Turturro plays Mac. Aida Turturro plays the wife. Ellen Barkin plays Oona Goldfarb. The movie was released in February 1992. ==Other websites== * * Category:1992 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American independent movies
title: Mac (movie)
